target: Wonderful. Have a great day. Bye.
context: <user>  I'm looking for an expensive hotel in the south to stay in. <system>  I have one hotel that meets that criteria. It has 3 stars and offers free wifi and parking. This would be the Lensfield Hotel. Can I book you a room? <user>  Yes, please book me a room. <system>  When will you be arriving and how many nights would you like to stay? How many people are in your party? <user>  Can you book the hotel for 4 people, 3 nights on Thursday? <system>  your booking was successful. your reference number is JCVMJBRZ . <user>  Thanks for your help. That's all I needed. <system>
